features: QUIKSET NET ATTACHMENT: Easily attach the netting to the goal posts by sliding the netting under the pre-attached clips and then use a screwdriver (not included) to tighten the clips to the posts - securing the netting in place
OFFICIAL SIZE: This goal is regulation size 72" x 48" dimensions to bring an authentic feel to your games
HEAVY DUTY STEEL TUBING: The pipes are constructed from heavy gauge steel tubing to stand up to even the hardest shots with 1.5 inch post diameter
HIGH-PERFORMANCE NET: This goal comes with a heavy construction pre-fit net to ensure durability so you can play year after year
AUTHENTIC SHOOTING BOARD: With an authentic ice like feel our shooting board allows you to take quality shots anytime or anywhere you need to practice
description: This complete goal, stick and ball set has everything you need to get started playing street hockey. the set includes a PVC goal, 2 wood/plastic sticks, and 1 official high density Hockey ball. Challenge your friends and transform your driveway into a Street Hockey experience.
